content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
The Castro to Bayview: 19.
The Castro to Pacific Heights: 16.
The Castro to Alamo Square: 8.
The Castro to Fisherman's Wharf: 24.
The Castro to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Bayview to The Castro: 20.
Bayview to Pacific Heights: 23.
Bayview to Alamo Square: 16.
Bayview to Fisherman's Wharf: 25.
Bayview to Golden Gate Park: 22.
Pacific Heights to The Castro: 16.
Pacific Heights to Bayview: 22.
Pacific Heights to Alamo Square: 10.
Pacific Heights to Fisherman's Wharf: 13.
Pacific Heights to Golden Gate Park: 15.
Alamo Square to The Castro: 8.
Alamo Square to Bayview: 16.
Alamo Square to Pacific Heights: 10.
Alamo Square to Fisherman's Wharf: 19.
Alamo Square to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Fisherman's Wharf to The Castro: 26.
Fisherman's Wharf to Bayview: 26.
Fisherman's Wharf to Pacific Heights: 12.
Fisherman's Wharf to Alamo Square: 20.
Fisherman's Wharf to Golden Gate Park: 25.
Golden Gate Park to The Castro: 13.
Golden Gate Park to Bayview: 23.
Golden Gate Park to Pacific Heights: 16.
Golden Gate Park to Alamo Square: 10.
Golden Gate Park to Fisherman's Wharf: 24.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at The Castro at 9:00AM. Rebecca will be at Bayview from 9:00AM to 12:45PM. You'd like to meet Rebecca for a minimum of 90 minutes. Amanda will be at Pacific Heights from 6:30PM to 9:45PM. You'd like to meet Amanda for a minimum of 90 minutes. James will be at Alamo Square from 9:45AM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet James for a minimum of 90 minutes. Sarah will be at Fisherman's Wharf from 8:00AM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Sarah for a minimum of 90 minutes. Melissa will be at Golden Gate Park from 9:00AM to 6:45PM. You'd like to meet Melissa for a minimum of 90 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.
